publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4433 Christine Grahame: Montenegro—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Montenegro on voting for independence in their recent referendum; notes that Montenegro can now take its place among the other nations of the world as a sovereign state able to determine its own destiny free from interference and able to drive social and economic policies tailored to Montenegrins, and notes that Montenegro has successfully managed to re-establish its independence through peaceful and democratic means and that such democratic independence movements are an inspiration to all those who wish to see their own nation reclaim its independence and freedom. Supported by: Brian Adam*
S2M-4433 Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4433 Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Michael Matheson*

S2M-4433 Christine Grahame: Montenegro—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Montenegro on voting for independence in their recent referendum; notes that Montenegro can now take its place among the other nations of the world as a sovereign state able to determine its own destiny free from interference and able to drive social and economic policies tailored to Montenegrins, and notes that Montenegro has successfully managed to re-establish its independence through peaceful and democratic means and that such democratic independence movements are an inspiration to all those who wish to see their own nation reclaim its independence and freedom. Supported by: Brian Adam, Rob Gibson, Jim Mather, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Bruce McFee, Ms Maureen Watt, Mr Adam Ingram, Michael Matheson
S2M-4433 Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Mr John Swinney*, Fiona Hyslop*
